ack.p: Special thanks are extended to the Centre for Environmental Management, Faculty of Science and Technology at Federation University, Australia for the provision of financial support, and we gratefully acknowledge Wendy Cloke of Federation University for providing access to critical laboratory equipment. We thank Mr. Allan Adair for reviewing this manuscript, and we note the invaluable advice given by Certified Organics Pty Ltd regarding the pine oil products tested in this project. Parks Victoria kindly allowed access to the field site at Cobbledicks Road, and we also thank Dr. Steve Sinclair from the Department of Environment, Water, Land and Planning for his support and advice during this project.
